section.name: Unit 1. Understanding Adult English Language Learners
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 1: Understanding Adult English Language Learners. In this unit, we will explore characteristics of adult English learners, or ELs; the strengths that they bring to learning English; and the potential barriers they face. We will see how by taking a learner-centered approach to teaching we can leverage learners’ strengths and address their needs. ​

To complete this unit:

  • Download the handouts, 
  • View the Unit 1 videos - Part 1 and Part 2,
  • Complete the knowledge check, and
  • Review the references and recommended resources.          

After you have downloaded the handouts from the folder below, view the Unit 1 Part 1 video.
